original_title: Il Trionfo del Tempo e del Disinganno
overview: Composed in 1707 in Rome, Handel's Il Trionfo del Tempo e del Disinganno is an oratorio in two parts with a libretto written by Cardinal Benedetto Pamphili. Staged by Krzysztof Warlikowski and conducted by Emmanuelle Ha√Øm, this sublime performance was presented at the Aix-en-Provence Festival in 2016.
title: Il Trionfo del Tempo e del Disinganno
